full_title: Wanna Be by GloRilla & Megan Thee Stallion
title: Wanna Be

description.plain: GloRilla and Megan Thee Stallion drop “Wanna Be,” a sizzling collab that’s all about owning independence. GloRilla spills on modern love while Megan brings her signature swagger, making it a fierce anthem. With infectious beats and sharp lyrics, this track is a bold hip-hop must-listen.
